data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The only thing that apparently can make Xeno toe the "party line" seems to be the capturing of his daughter. He ____ willing ____ go ____ extreme ____, ____ his ____ principles ____ turning Harry over ____ the Ministry, ____ order ____ regain Luna's freedom. This is possibly because, since his wife died, Luna is his only family.
data.partBlankContent: The only thing that apparently can make Xeno toe the "party line" seems to be the capturing of his daughter. He i_ willing t_ go t_ extreme len____, aband_____ his o__ principles a__ turning Harry over t_ the Ministry, i_ order t_ regain Luna's freedom. This is possibly because, since his wife died, Luna is his only family.
data.answer: 唯一能让谢诺服从“政党路线”的事情似乎是他的女儿被抓。为了重新获得卢娜的自由，他不惜付出极端的代价，放弃自己的原则，把哈利交给魔法部。这可能是因为，自从他的妻子去世后，卢娜是他唯一的家人。
